title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 96.1 - Restrictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 96.1 - Restrictions

State Regulations

No person shall trespass for any purpose whatsoever, except
persons authorized by the Long Island State Parks, Recreation and Historic

Preservation Commission or the Department of Environmental Conservation, in the
area within any area posted with "Restricted Area" signs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
96.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
